prompt: <description>**Part 1: Base Rectangular Prism** The first part of the CAD model is a rectangular prism. This part will serve as the base for the smaller rectangular prism that will be added on top of it. 1. **Create a new coordinate system**. The euler angles should be set to [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] and the translation vector should be set to [0.0, 0.0, 0.175]. 2. **Draw the first face of the prism**. This face is a rectangle with four lines. The first line goes from (0.0, 0.0) to (0.175, 0.0). The second line goes from (0.175, 0.0) to (0.175, 0.175). The third line goes from (0.175, 0.175) to (0.0, 0.175). The fourth line goes from (0.0, 0.175) to (0.0, 0.0). 3. **Draw the second face of the prism**. This face is also a rectangle with four lines. The first line goes from (0.0, 0.575) to (0.175, 0.575). The second line goes from (0.175, 0.575) to (0.175, 0.75). The third line goes from (0.175, 0.75) to (0.0, 0.75). The fourth line goes from (0.0, 0.75) to (0.0, 0.575). 4. **Draw the third face of the prism**. This face is a rectangle with four lines. The first line goes from (0.575, 0.0) to (0.75, 0.0). The second line goes from (0.75, 0.0) to (0.75, 0.175). The third line goes from (0.75, 0.175) to (0.575, 0.175). The fourth line goes from (0.575, 0.175) to (0.575, 0.0). 5. **Draw the fourth face of the prism**. This face is also a rectangle with four lines. The first line goes from (0.575, 0.575) to (0.75, 0.575). The second line goes from (0.75, 0.575) to (0.75, 0.75). The third line goes from (0.75, 0.75) to (0.575, 0.75). The fourth line goes from (0.575, 0.75) to (0.575, 0.575). 6. **Scale the sketch** by a factor of 0.75. 7. **Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch** using the euler angles and translation vector specified in the coordinate system. 8. **Extrude the 2D sketch** to a depth of 0.175 units in the direction opposite the normal of the sketching plane. 9. **Complete the part**. This part will be the base of the overall CAD model and will have a length and width of 0.75 units and a height of 0.175 units. The smaller rectangular prism will be added on top of this part in the next step.</description>
